question: Who has won India's first Gold in the Women's Junior 500 metres race at the 5th Track Asia Cup Cycling 2018?
explanation: Mayuri Lute has won India\'s first Gold in the Women\'s Junior 500 metres race at the 5th edition of the Track Asia Cup cycling tournament in New Delhi on September 21, 2018. Beside her, The Indian men\'s junior team performed as expected in the team sprint event won gold by defeating Kazakhstan. With this, India won 3 Gold, 3Silver and a Bronze on the opening day of the tournament. The event at the Indira Gandhi Indoor Stadium is being organised by the Cycling Federation of India (CFI) and has attracted participation from 12 countries.
